frontmatter.excerpt: The Mobile Plan Analysis project uses Power BI and a web crawler to extract data from various websites. It also involves developing REST APIs in Java for analysis, implementing functionalities like page ranking, inverted indexing, and pattern matching using data structures such as HashMap, LinkedList, and Tree.
